languages.text: "Если вы желаете побеседовать с Ирлиэт, то найдете ее снаружи, в оранжерее. Скорее всего, она ютится где-то рядом с беседкой, в одиночестве, — она предпочитает держаться особняком от прочих подданных".

traits.locale_text: "Если вы желаете побеседовать с Ирлиэт, то найдете ее снаружи, в оранжерее. Скорее всего, она ютится где-то рядом с беседкой, в одиночестве, — она предпочитает держаться особняком от прочих подданных".

languages.text: "If you wish to speak to Yrliet, you will find her outside in the orangery, most likely by the gazebo. She prefers to keep her distance from others."
languages.original_text: "Если вы желаете побеседовать с Ирлиэт, то найдете ее снаружи, в оранжерее. Скорее всего, она ютится где-то рядом с беседкой, в одиночестве, — она предпочитает держаться особняком от прочих подданных".

traits.locale_text: "If you wish to speak to Yrliet, you will find her outside. Alone, most likely — she prefers to keep her distance from others. You should look for her by the pavilion."
"If you wish to speak to Yrliet, you will find her outside. Alone, most likely — she prefers to keep her distance from others. You should look for her by the pavilion."
"If you wish to speak to Yrliet, you will find her outside. Alone, most likely — she prefers to keep her distance from others. You should look for her by the pavilion."
"If you wish to speak to Yrliet, you will find her outside in the orangery, most likely by the gazebo. She prefers to keep her distance from others."

languages.text: “如果您想找伊莉耶特谈谈，那就去外面的橘子园看看吧，她多半是在凉亭旁边。她喜欢与别人保持距离。”
languages.original_text: "If you wish to speak to Yrliet, you will find her outside in the orangery, most likely by the gazebo. She prefers to keep her distance from others."

traits.locale_text: “如果您想找伊莉耶特谈谈，那就去外面的橘子园看看吧，她多半是在凉亭旁边。她喜欢与别人保持距离。”

languages.text: «Si desea hablar con Yrliet, la encontrará en el naranjal, probablemente cerca del quiosco. Suele preferir estar alejada de los demás».
languages.original_text: "If you wish to speak to Yrliet, you will find her outside in the orangery, most likely by the gazebo. She prefers to keep her distance from others."

traits.locale_text: «Si desea hablar con Yrliet, la encontrará en el naranjal, probablemente cerca del quiosco. Suele preferir estar alejada de los demás».

languages.text: 「ユリエットと話したいなら、外にあるオレンジの温室でしょう。ほぼ間違いなく展望台にいるはずです。他人と距離を置くことを好んでいますから」
languages.original_text: "If you wish to speak to Yrliet, you will find her outside in the orangery, most likely by the gazebo. She prefers to keep her distance from others."

traits.locale_text: 「ユリエットと話したいなら、外にあるオレンジの温室でしょう。ほぼ間違いなく展望台にいるはずです。他人と距離を置くことを好んでいますから」

languages.text: "Solltet Ihr mit Yrliet sprechen wollen, so findet Ihr sie draußen in der Orangerie, wahrscheinlich beim Pavillon. Sie hält lieber Distanz zu den anderen."
languages.original_text: "If you wish to speak to Yrliet, you will find her outside in the orangery, most likely by the gazebo. She prefers to keep her distance from others."

traits.locale_text: "Solltet Ihr mit Yrliet sprechen wollen, so findet Ihr sie draußen in der Orangerie, wahrscheinlich beim Pavillon. Sie hält lieber Distanz zu den anderen."

languages.text: « Si vous souhaitez parler à Yrliet, vous la trouverez probablement à l'extérieur de l'orangerie, près du belvédère. Elle préfère rester à l'écart. »
languages.original_text: "If you wish to speak to Yrliet, you will find her outside in the orangery, most likely by the gazebo. She prefers to keep her distance from others."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous souhaitez parler à Yrliet, vous la trouverez probablement à l'extérieur de l'orangerie, près du belvédère. Elle préfère rester à l'écart. »

languages.text: "Yrliet ile konuşmak isterseniz kendisini serada, muhtemelen çardağın orada bulabilirsiniz. İnsanlarla arasına mesafe koymayı tercih eder."
languages.original_text: "If you wish to speak to Yrliet, you will find her outside in the orangery, most likely by the gazebo. She prefers to keep her distance from others."

traits.locale_text: "Yrliet ile konuşmak istiyorsanız kendisini dışarıda, muhtemelen seradaki çardağın yanında bulabilirsiniz. İnsanlarla arasına mesafe koymayı tercih eder."
